products.name: G3 Super White Grout
products.description:
POLYBLEND G-3 is a pure white, mould resistant, cement based, compressible grout that has been designed to give tile joints a smooth satin like appearance.

POLYBLEND G-3 is recommended for wall joints up to 3mm wide and is suitable in both internal and external applications.

PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS

  • Pure White
  • Anti- fungal
  • Smooth appearance
  • Flexible
  • Economical
  • Easy to clean
  • Low VOC
  • Hydrophobic (water repellent)

products.name: G10-Coloured Grout
products.description:
POLYBLEND G-10 is a high quality, flexible, cement based, coloured grout designed for grouting most types of tiles including ceramic, porcelain, natural stone and glass mosaics. In 2.5kg & 10kg bags

POLYBLEND G-10 can be used in both internal and external applications for joints between 1.5mm and 10mm wide. Itâ€™s unique hydrophobic formula makes the grout water repellent, which reduces the effects of efflorescence while also ensuring grout colour consistency. The grout also contains an anti-fungal agent that prevents the growth of mould.

PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS

  • Smooth appearance
  • Flexible
  • Hydrophobic (water repellent)
  • Reduced efflorescence
  • Colour consistent
  • Easy to apply
  • Easy to clean
  • Anti Fungal
  • Extended coverage
  • Low VOC
